questions.question: What is the best definition of a business plan?

choices.answer: A plan for the development of the business incl. forecasts
A description of how sales are generated
The company's management's daily schedule
A list of the equipment the business needs to buy

questions.question: Which one of the items below is NOT a typical reason to write a business plan?

choices.answer: To prove that there is strong demand for the product
To show that cash flows are sufficient for survival
To obtain finance from banks or investors
To demonstrate good literacy skills

questions.question: Which one of the lists below includes ONLY regular sections of a business plan?

choices.answer: Executive summary, Market, Product, Management, Holidays
Executive summary, Colour Scheme, Production/Operations
Marketing, Financial Projections, Mgmt Team's Birthdays
Product, Financial Projections, Funding Requirement

questions.question: What is the name of the first section of the business plan listing its main conclusions?

choices.answer: Marketing Plan
Executive Summary
Funding Requirements
Sales Forecast

questions.question: What does USP stand for when talking about business plans?

choices.answer: United States Penitentiary
Universal Self-Loading Pistol
Unique Selling Point
Urban Services Plan

questions.question: What content are you most likely to find under the title "Markets" in a business plan?

choices.answer: Age, gender and other characteristics of potential customers
Current price of fruits and vegetables
The location of the company's headquarters
The types of product the business intends to sell

questions.question: Why is it crucial to include information on the mgmt team in your business plan?

choices.answer: Expertise and experience are crucial for business success
Banks need to know where to find key managers
In order to avoid discrimination
It will be easier for managers to remember all the names

questions.question: Which one of the businesses below would be direct competitors of a new local bowling alley?

choices.answer: Tesco's and Boots nearby
Costa Cafe and Starbucks
Odeon Cinemas and Laser Quest next door
Happy Tails Doggy Daycare

questions.question: Which is most likely to be part of your financial projections?

choices.answer: The opening hours of you business
Expected sales, costs and cash flows
The parking spaces available to your customers
The colour of your product's packaging

questions.question: Which 2 pieces of information would you need to project the sales of a new fitness club?

choices.answer: The opening hours and the type of equipment installed
The age of your customers and their exercise habits
The surface area and the number of showers
The number of members and the monthly membership fee
